features.name: Authentication & Authorization
features.description: JWT-based authentication with role-based access control (Student, Admin, Recruiter, Mentor)

features.name: Student Dashboard
features.description: Main dashboard for students showing internships, applications, and quick actions

features.name: Student Profile Management
features.description: Student profile creation, editing, and viewing with skills, education, and experience

features.name: Internship Browsing & Applications
features.description: Browse internships, filter by criteria, and submit applications

features.name: Jobs & Career Page
features.description: Job listings and career resources for students

features.name: Resume Builder
features.description: AI-powered resume builder with templates, auto-fill, and PDF generation

features.name: Internship Performance Passport (IPP)
features.description: Digital passport system for tracking internship performance, evaluations, and certificates

features.name: AI Mock Interview
features.description: Voice-enabled AI mock interview system with real-time feedback and scoring

features.name: Admin Dashboard
features.description: Admin portal for managing students, internships, applications, and system analytics

features.name: Recruiter Dashboard
features.description: Recruiter portal for posting internships, browsing candidates, and managing applications

features.name: Mentor Dashboard
features.description: Mentor portal for reviewing student applications and providing evaluations

features.name: Student Directory
features.description: Searchable directory of students with filtering by department, year, and skills

features.name: Navigation & Layout
features.description: Responsive navigation bar and layout components with role-based menu items

features.name: Landing Page
features.description: Public landing page with feature showcase and login options

features.name: Calendar & Scheduling
features.description: Calendar views for students and admins to track events and deadlines

features.name: Skill Gap Analysis
features.description: AI-powered skill gap analysis widget for students

features.name: AI Services
features.description: Integration with Google Gemini AI for content generation and analysis

features.name: Real-time Dashboard
features.description: Real-time analytics and metrics dashboard component

features.name: Public Resume Viewer
features.description: Public URL for viewing student resumes

features.name: UI Components
features.description: Reusable UI components including buttons, cards, inputs, and form elements

features.name: Routing & App Configuration
features.description: Main application routing, role-based redirects, and app mode detection

features.name: Toast Notifications
features.description: Toast notification system for user feedback

features.name: Session Management
features.description: Session conflict handling for multi-role scenarios

features.name: Utility Functions
features.description: Helper functions and utilities for common operations
